scripts.petstore: npm run transpile && node index.mjs https://petstore3.swagger.io/api/v3/openapi.json petstore
scripts.github: npm run transpile && node index.mjs https://raw.githubusercontent.com/github/rest-api-description/main/descriptions/api.github.com/api.github.com.json github
scripts.jira: npm run transpile && node index.mjs https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/swagger-v3.v3.json jira
scripts.spec01: npm run transpile && node index.mjs ./test/spec01.json spec01
scripts.spec02: npm run transpile && node index.mjs ./test/spec02.json spec02
